guild.description:
For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

Rule 3:

body: I never blamed all of my problems on that. I blamed people dismissing my problems as me trying to get attention or troll on that, because human brains are not wired to care about the expendable male, thus one voicing his problems is perceived as an annoyance, but the opposite is true for females. You may *think* you treat everyone equally but your primal instincts skew your perception before you can even process it.
body_html: I never blamed all of my problems on that. I blamed people dismissing my problems as me trying to get attention or troll on that, because human brains are not wired to care about the expendable male, thus one voicing his problems is perceived as an annoyance, but the opposite is true for females. You may think you treat everyone equally but your primal instincts skew your perception before you can even process it.

body: Because there is. Look at who gets banned. Look at who gets very lax punishments for the same offenses. Look at who the guildmasters are on guilds run by the admins. Look at how the admins make their friends "mods" on the discord server which grants them special privileges more than it involves actually moderating. Look at how the admins and certain discord groups troll and use their admin powers to do so, yet ban anyone else who does the exact same thing.

body: My problems literally get dismissed immediately because people see a man with problems and think he's either being manipulative or a weakling who deserves it. We're supposed to show no weakness, all responsibility, no emotion, no complaining, or we're just a whiny spoiled brat, no matter how bad our situation is. Even people who purposely try to treat people equally, including me, do this because it's such a firmly rooted primal instinct. Our brains aren't wired to care about the expendable male.
body_html: My problems literally get dismissed immediately because people see a man with problems and think he's either being manipulative or a weakling who deserves it. We're supposed to show no weakness, all responsibility, no emotion, no complaining, or we're just a whiny spoiled brat, no matter how bad our situation is. Even people who purposely try to treat people equally, including me, do this because it's such a firmly rooted primal instinct. Our brains aren't wired to care about the expendable male.

parent.body: I never blamed all of my problems on that. I blamed people dismissing my problems as me trying to get attention or troll on that, because human brains are not wired to care about the expendable male, thus one voicing his problems is perceived as an annoyance, but the opposite is true for females. You may *think* you treat everyone equally but your primal instincts skew your perception before you can even process it.

I blamed people dismissing my problems as me trying to get attention or troll on that, because human brains are not wired to care about the expendable male, thus one voicing his problems is perceived as an annoyance, but the opposite is true for females. You may think you treat everyone equally but your primal instincts skew your perception before you can even process it.

body:
> who?

You

> greg, seq, angst, sentient, nova. am i missing anyone? they all hold no "power" over ruqqus.

Neither did the people in DefaultMods, but they certainly wield a lot of *influence*. And since the discord server is official to Ruqqus LLC. they actually do hold some power over ruqqus, not to mention that the admins planned to implement "site moderators" early on and I think you can guess who that would've given that to.

> rcp was a joke...

It's run by the admins' discord circle, thus many of the people controlling it could be described as cabal members. And it's not entirely a joke, remember how they sieged guilds and admins used admin powers to help their trolling operations, and when members broke the rules they were given extremely light sentences, and even that was only because the users found out that it was happening.
body_html:
who?

You

greg, seq, angst, sentient, nova. am i missing anyone? they all hold no "power" over ruqqus.

Neither did the people in DefaultMods, but they certainly wield a lot of influence. And since the discord server is official to Ruqqus LLC. they actually do hold some power over ruqqus, not to mention that the admins planned to implement "site moderators" early on and I think you can guess who that would've given that to.

rcp was a joke...

It's run by the admins' discord circle, thus many of the people controlling it could be described as cabal members. And it's not entirely a joke, remember how they sieged guilds and admins used admin powers to help their trolling operations, and when members broke the rules they were given extremely light sentences, and even that was only because the users found out that it was happening.
